DOC.brief_summary: This trial compare two oral analgesic regimen woman undergo first trimester medical abortion mifepristone misoprostol . The primary study outcome pain .
DOC.brief_title: Pain Control In First Trimester Medical Abortion : A Randomized Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This trial compare two oral analgesic regimen woman undergo first trimester medical abortion mifepristone misoprostol . The primary study outcome pain . Secondary objective include compare regimen total amount ibuprofen take , use analgesic , vaginal bleeding , adverse event , successful completion abortion , overall satisfaction abortion procedure .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman gestational age 63 day less Desire medical abortion mifepristone misoprostol Have contraindication ibuprofen
